#summary Notes on how to work with the code.

*get the code*
{{{
 svn checkout http://betfairfree.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ betfairfree
 cd betfairfree
}}}

*check your balance*
{{{
 perl -I./lib t/getAccountFunds.pl -u username -p password
}}}

*log a market's best prices*
{{{
 perl -I./lib t/log_best_prices.pl -u username -p password -interval 10 -m marketid
}}}

*create a session*
{{{
 perl -I./lib t/session.pl -u username -p password
}}}
